author: Special Correspondent
text:
A special re-allotment counselling for eligible students of erstwhile SVS Yoga and Naturopathy Medical College will be held on February 10. at the Commissionerate of Indian Medicine and Homoeopathy, according to a release.

The students who have joined and are currently studying BNYS degree course at the college from 2008-09 to 2014-15 and have registered their names with Tamil Nadu Dr. MGR Medical University are eleigible to participate.

Also those students who have joined BYNS course for the current academic year as per the allotment order issued by the selection committee of the commissionerate and based on the seat matrix issued by the medical university are eligible to participate.

The counselling will be held at Arignar Anna Government Hospital at Arumbakkam from 10 a.m. For more information candidates may contact the selection committee office of Indian Medicine and Homoeopathy Department at 044-26126244.
title: Counselling for SVS college students
